header.description:
Normal map based Vanilla RTX resource pack, All blocks are covered, Includes a subpack for heightmaps (accessible via Gear Icon by clicking on pack) Restart Minecraft after switch switching subpacks!
Discord.gg/dx92mDNMTX
Created with love by: CubeIR
